title: Tag: Best in Class
summary: This page is a blog tag archive for 'Best in Class' content on FlexPay. It features an article discussing chargebacks and how FlexPay aims to prevent them from increasing, along with a revenue and customer recovery calculator.
key_points: FlexPay blog archive for 'Best in Class' tag.
Article addresses concerns about chargeback increases with FlexPay.
Features a Revenue and Customer Recovery Calculator.
FlexPay focuses on recovering failed payments and minimizing churn.
